about_the_game:
THE HORROR SOUNDTRACK


The original game soundtrack includes 9 completely original songs, most characterized with musical traits from the actual region where the game is set - Piaui, Brazil. The tense songs tries to simulate the feeling of desolation and distress experienced by the protagonist of the game. Furthermore, the OST also includes some additional tracks of the extras found in the game.

THE SOUNDTRACK LIST


01 - The Last NightMary - Main Theme
02 - Beast Breath Hungry
03 - Diabolical Maze Forest
04 - Is This a Safe Place?
05 - Ritualistic
06 - Key...Sky.mp3
07 - The Last Act of Hope
08 - Mysterious Arctifact - UFO Ending
09 - Homecoming - Ending

Sound Designer: Carlos Pazuzu
